About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project is in safe hands

I am Gonzalo Techera, from Montevideo Uruguay. For the past 25 years I have been developing software for a company and now I am freelancing as web developer.

HMTL, CSS, Javascript, React, Vue, Node.js and Databases are my primary skills. I am also a Senior Genexus developer.

I am father of a beautiful daughter, husband, and a football coach. Not soccer, american football. You can check our league web site in www.lufa.com.uy.
